Ko Hyunjoo

Korean: 고현주

Country:

Full name:
Ko Hyunjoo
Native name:

Introduction


Ko Hyunjoo (고현주) is a South Korean singer under E&C who debuted on July 12, 2019 with 민들레, an OST for the drama 내 별명은 대토령.

Jul 12, 2019
Current state:
active 
Active years:
2019-present

Chungnam University
